title: Samsung - 32N5300 LED Smart TV - 32'' inch
description:
Enjoy smart beyond expectation

* Actual product may differ from image shown. Please see our product gallery.

World’s No.1 TV brand 12 years running

Samsung is the world’s No. 1 TV brand, leading the industry with the highest market share for 12 straight years. With Samsung TV, you can enjoy advanced technology, outstanding design, innovative services, and the content partnerships that consumers demand.

*Specifications may vary depending on model or region. *Results based on IHS Markit, Technology Group, TV Sets Intelligence Service – Premium, Annual Unit and Annual Revenue Basis, 2006 – 2017. Information is not an endorsement of Samsung. Any reliance on these results is at the third party's own risk. Visit www.technology.ihs.com for more details.*Results based on Futuresource Consulting, Worldwide TV Market Share by Manufacturer - Annual unit basis.

HDR, see more details

Watch HDR content with better clarity and detailed colour expression. Samsung HD TV gives you more accurate details in bright and dark scenes.

* Supports HDR10 content only.

Ultra clean view

Analyzing original content with an advanced algorithm, Ultra Clean View gives you higher quality images with less distortion. Enjoy the clear picture.

PurColour

Watch your favourite content with natural colours that deliver details as crisp as the real thing. Get a more colourful viewing experience.

Micro Dimming Pro

Experience shadow detail and colour. Dividing the screen into zones, Micro Dimming Pro analyzes each one for deeper blacks and purer whites.

An intelligent way to enjoy the smart TV
Availability of the feature and Graphic User Interface (GUI) may vary by region. Check before use.

Get to your entertainment the faster, easier, and intelligent way. One Depth gathers a variety of content for you on one screen. Get easy access to different content providers and check out the thumbnail previews before diving in.

* Smart service and GUI(Graphic User Interface) may vary by model and region.

SmartThings App, just one app for all
Availability of the feature and Graphic User Interface (GUI) may vary by region. Check before use.

The SmartThings app also offers features such as Remote Control, and Mirror Screen.

* SmartThings compatible devices may vary by region. * This function may differ by mobile and OS(Operation System). * Download and installation of SmartThings app are required.

Mobile Set-up
Step 1.

Download and open SmartThings App to set up Smart TV. *

Step 2.

Network and Samsung Account information will be shared with your TV automatically, initiating setup from your mobile. **

Step 3.

Select the apps you want to enjoy and add them to the Smart Hub.

Step 4.

That’s it! Now, just kick back and enjoy your Smart TV! ***

Availability of the feature and Graphic User Interface (GUI) may vary by region. Check before use.* A Samsung Account is required to set up TV via mobile.** Wi-Fi connection on your mobile is required to share network information with your TV.*** TV set-up process can also be done by remote control
Content Sync & Share

Take full advantage of the Samsung Cloud. Seamlessly connect your Samsung smart devices to sync photos. Now you can share your mobile pictures and enjoy it on the TV or refrigerator screen.

* Compatible devieces only.* Availability of the feature may vary depending on the model.

More Contents

It doesn't stop here. Endless content awaits.

TV Plus
Availability of the feature and Graphic User Interface (GUI) may vary by region. Check before use.

TV Plus offers latest content and movies so you enjoy a cinematic experience at the comfort of your own home.

* TV Plus service and GUI may vary by region.

Steam Link
Availability of the feature and Graphic User Interface (GUI) may vary by region. Check before use.

Enjoy your high speed PC games on the TV via Steam Link. Play your favourite PC games on the big screen without having to squint and hunch over a small monitor.

title: LG Latest LED LG 32LH510
description:
LG 32LH510 TV.

With its 32 inches 720p HD Ready LED and Freeview HD Tuner the LG 32LH510 TV is a great addition to any room large or small. It even includes three Built-In Games.

*USB flash drive required to save game files.

Care and attention have been paid to the audio systems on this TV to help your immersion in your choice of viewing. The Virtual Surround Software combined with the Clear Voice Audio Enhancements not only produce surround sound effect without the need for external speakers but also separates vocal audio from background sounds to give you clarity to every spoken word.

The LG 32LH510 TV helps to get the most out of your viewing with the Picture Wizard III Engine. Choose one of 8 pre-set Picture Modes to suit the type of viewing you require or simply adjust black level, color, tint, sharpness, and backlight level to suit the needs of your view and the conditions of your room.

title: Samsung 40 Inch HD Smart LED TV
description:
Active Crystal Color

Jump further into every story with a wider color expression with Active Crystal Color. It uses crystal-like pure color technology to make every picture mesmerizing.

 

 

Slim Design

Find a breathtaking collaboration of beauty and technology with the slim design of 4K UHD. Not only does it offer optimized contrast across multiple zones of the picture, it’s stunning to look at from back to front.

 

Simplified Smart TV Experience

Switch from cable to streaming as easily as changing a channel, and control your other devices – all with one remote.

 

 

 

HDR Premium

High Dynamic Range technology dramatically brightens every image and enhances contrast, so even the most subtle details come out of hiding.

 

 

UHD Upscaling Picture Engine

UHD Upscaling Picture Engine upgrades lower resolution movies and TV shows to a stunning near ultra high-definition experience with enhanced detail and optimized picture. 

 

 

UHD Dimming

UHD Dimming technology provides optimized contrast, color and sharpness for true-to-life image quality. More intricate than the existing Micro Dimming, it’s a viewing experience like never before.

 

 

Smart View

Take pictures, videos and music from your mobile and PC to your Smart TV using the Samsung Smart View app. It gives you amazing convergence and easy connectivity, with majority of personal devices.

HDMI for Your Home Theater

A TV without an HDMI is like listening to a cricket match on radio. An HDMI is a good, single-wire, digital audio/video interface essentially required to connect you TV to a digital cable box, satellite box, DVD player, external Blu-ray player, computer, gaming console, tablet, smartphone or any other device with an HDMI output. This magnificent TV set features four HDMI input ports, in order to connect multiple devices simultaneously.

title: Hisense Full HD Led TV 40N2173 - 40 Inch HD LED TV - Black
description:
A world full of detail and contrast, in Basic FULL HD LED TV Limited Stock Available
LED TV & Headphons will be delivered Separately.

VIVID COLOR

Hisense Ful HD TV maximizes color reproduction to take your reviewing to the next level. Whether its sports, soaps, movies, enjoy true to life colors the way they were meant to be seen.

HIGH CONTRAST

On high contrast panel, obvious depth of field can be seen-whites look brighter, blacks look darker and colors look more lively. Hisense TV allows you to discover more shadow detail and accurate color when you watch your favorite video content.

MOTION PICTURE ENHANCER

Motion Picture Enhancer adopts black image insertion technology to reduce motion trail of fast moving images, therefore, the clarity of sports games or movies looks better as each fast movement appears more fluent, smooth and clear.

EASY FUN WITH HI – DMP

Enjoy the excitement of your favorite movies, music and photos via USB. Just plug your USB into the TV and you can watch the variety of content in one simple step.

CREATE YOUR OWN HOME ENTERTATINMENT

Hisense TVs Support HDMI inputs, which allows you to create a multimedia entertainment center at home. All you need to do is to connect HDMI into your TV to view various contents from multiple devices.
